mapper.select: select id , name , parent_id as parentId, weight from `tb_region` where id = #{id};

select id, bank , bsb , accountno as accountNo , simple , gmt_create as gmtCreate , gmt_modify as gmtModify , is_delete as `delete` from `b_finance_bank` where is_delete = 0 limit #{pageNumber},#{pageSize};

select id , gmt_create AS gmtCreate, gmt_modify as gmtModify, bank_date as bankDate, user_id as userId, is_income as isIncome, money , balance , amount , adviser_id as adviserId, business , order_id as orderId, comment from `b_finance_code` where order_id = #{orderId};

select id , gmt_create AS gmtCreate, gmt_modify as gmtModify, bank_date as bankDate, user_id as userId, is_income as isIncome, money , balance , amount , adviser_id as adviserId, business , order_id as orderId, comment, code from `b_finance_code` where code = #{code};

select id, bank , bsb , accountno as accountNo , simple , gmt_create as gmtCreate , gmt_modify as gmtModify , is_delete as `delete` from `b_finance_bank` where is_delete = 0 and id = #{financeBankId};

select id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, gmt_modify AS gmtModify, bank_date AS bankDate, user_id AS userId, is_income AS isIncome, money, balance, amount , adviser_id AS adviserId, business, order_id AS orderId, comment from `b_finance_code` where id = #{id};
